entry.author: Steve Folkes
entry.content: Added "--show-errors" option to show error table, and "--help" option to show command line options. Froze version 3.2.

entry.author: Steve Folkes
entry.content: Added "--rename-file" option for reading renaming information from files. Froze version 3.1.

entry.author: Steve Folkes
entry.content: Added "--suppress-mult" option to suppress non-unique definitions. Removed "--rename" option from library construction.

entry.author: Steve Folkes
entry.content: Created new version of the TDF linker. Complete rewrite, borrowing the library code from SID. Added several new features such as renaming, link suppression, extensible format for libraries and linker information units, and more regular treatment of non token and tag names. Froze version 3.0.
